scripts.dev: npm run searxng:ensure && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n api,web -c blue,green "npm run api" "npm run frontend"
scripts.install:api: pip install -r requirements.txt && python -m spacy download en_core_web_sm
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:api && npm run install:frontend
scripts.searxng:ensure: docker start searxng 2>/dev/null || npm run searxng
scripts.searxng:stop: docker stop searxng && docker rm searxng
scripts.pipeline:run: python -c "import asyncio; from app.agents.orchestrator import run_pipeline; asyncio.run(run_pipeline(mock_mode=False))"
scripts.pipeline:mock: python -c "import asyncio; from app.agents.orchestrator import run_pipeline; asyncio.run(run_pipeline(mock_mode=True))"
